name: Dungeons & Dragons OnlineÂ®
description: Server is not up 24/7 so check the official forums.
content:
files:
- setup: http://live.ddo.com/sites/clientdl/ddo/preview/ddopreview.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StandingStoneGames/Dungeons & Dragons Online (Preview)/DNDLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StandingStoneGames/Dungeons & Dragons
      Online (Preview)
    src: setup
- task:
    description: Installing Dungeons & Dragons Online (Preview)
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  pulse_latency: true
  reset_pulse: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
